post.description: Use this API to get the cashier page address. After getting the cashier page address, you can redirect the user to the cashier page to make a payment.

quoteId.description:
The unique ID that is assigned by Antom to identify an exchange rate. 

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

quoteCurrencyPair.description:
The exchange rate between settlement currency and transaction currency. Two currencies are separated with a slash and use the three-letter ISO-4217 currency code.  

More information:

Maximum length: 16 characters

quotePrice.description:
The exchange rate used when a currency conversion between settlement currency and transaction currency occurs.  

More information:

Value range: 1 - unlimited

quoteStartTime.description:
Effective time of the exchange rate. 

More information:

The value follows the ISO 8601 standard format. For example, "2019-11-27T12:01:01+08:00".

quoteExpiryTime.description:
Expiration time of the exchange rate.  

More information:

The value follows the ISO 8601 standard format. For example, "2019-11-27T12:01:01+08:00".

guaranteed.description: Guaranteed exchange rate available for payment.

acquirerName.description:
The name of the acquirer. 

Note: This parameter is returned if you integrate the APO product.  

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

referenceRequestId.description:
The unique ID that is assigned by APO to identify a payment request sent to the acquirer.

Note: This parameter is returned if you integrate the APO product.  

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

acquirerTransactionId.description:
The unique ID that is assigned by the acquirer to identify a transaction. 

Note: This parameter is returned if you integrate the APO product.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

acquirerMerchantId.description:
The unique ID that is assigned by the acquirer to identify a merchant. 

Note: This parameter is returned if you integrate the APO product.  

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

acquirerResultCode.description:
The acquirer's result code that indicates the transaction process result.  

Note: This parameter is returned if you integrate the APO product.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

acquirerResultMessage.description:
The result message that describes acquirerResultCode in detail.  

Note: This parameter is returned if you integrate the APO product.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

resultCode.description:
Result code. Possible values are listed in the Result/Error codes table on this page.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

resultStatus.description:
Result status. Valid values are:

S: Indicates that the refund succeeded.
F: Indicates that the refund failed.
U: Indicates that the refund result is unknown.

resultMessage.description:
Result message that explains the result code.

More information:

Maximum length: 256 characters

currency.description:
The currency used for the corresponding payment of the refund. The value is a 3-letter currency code that follows the ISO 4217 standard.

More information:

Maximum length: 3 characters

value.description:
The value of the amount as a positive integer in the smallest currency unit. For example, if the currency is USD and the amount is $1.00, set the value of this parameter to 100; or if the currency is JPY and the amount is ￥1, set the value of this parameter to 1.  

For details about the smallest currency unit, see Smallest unit of the currency .

For details about the minimum payment amount allowed for each payment method, see Minimum amount rules. 

Note: Due to the currency practices in Indonesia, when the currency is IDR, round the amount with banker's rounding and fix the last two digits of this parameter as 00.  

More information:

Value range: 1 - unlimited

refundRequestId.description:
The unique ID assigned by the merchant to identify a refund request.

More information:

This field is an API idempotency field.The merchant uses the refundRequestId field for idempotency control. For payment requests that are initiated with the same value of refundRequestId and reach a final status (S or F), the same result is to be returned for the request.
Maximum length: 64 characters

paymentId.description:
The unique ID assigned by Antom for the original payment to be refunded.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

referenceRefundId.description:
The unique ID to identify a refund, which is assigned by the merchant that directly provides services or goods to the customer.

Note: Specify this field if this value is needed for internal use or reconciliation.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

refundAmount.description: The refund amount that is initiated by the merchant.

refundReason.description:
The refund reason.

Note: Specify this field if you want to provide the refund reason to the user and payment method.

More information:

Maximum length: 256 characters

refundNotifyUrl.description:
The URL that is used to receive the refund result notification. The URL must be either specified in the request or set in Antom Dashboard.

Note: Specify this field if you want to receive an asynchronous notification of the refund result. If the refund notification URL is specified in both the request and Antom Dashboard, the value specified in the request takes precedence.

More information:

Maximum length: 1024 characters

refundAmount.description: The refund amount that is initiated by the merchant.

result.description: Indicates whether this API is called successfully. If this API is successfully called, the refund succeeds.

refundRequestId.description:
The unique ID that is assigned by the merchant to identify a refund request.

Note: This field is returned when the refund succeeds (the value of result.resultStatus is S).

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

refundId.description:
The unique ID that is assigned by Antom to identify a refund. A one-to-one correspondence between refundId and refundRequestId exists. 

Note: This field is returned when the refund succeeds (the value of result.resultStatus is S).

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

paymentId.description:
The unique ID assigned by Antom for the original payment to be refunded.

Note: This field is returned when the refund succeeds (the value of result.resultStatus is S).

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

refundAmount.description: The refund amount that is initiated by the merchant.

refundTime.description:
The date and time when the refund reaches the state of success, failure, or unknown.

More information:

The value follows the ISO 8601 standard format. For example, "2019-11-27T12:01:01+08:00".

refundNonGuaranteeCouponAmount.description: The refund amount that is initiated by the merchant.

grossSettlementAmount.description: The refund amount that is initiated by the merchant.

settlementQuote.description:
The exchange rate between the settlement currency and transaction currency.

Note: This field is returned when grossSettlementAmount is returned.

acquirerInfo.description:
The information of the acquirer that processes the payment. 

Note: This parameter is returned if you integrate the APO product.

acquirerReferenceNo.description:
The unique ID assigned by the non-Antom acquirer for the transaction.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters
